trans-unit.source: An attribute that, when applied to a method, indicates that the method is a proxy for a function in the conceptual model or storage model.
An <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function.

For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model.
Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries.
To use an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true:
The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function.
The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function.
For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute"></xref> class.
An <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> links a common language runtime (CLR) method to another function.

For example, the attribute can be used to map a CLR method to a function that is exposed by the storage provider, to a user-defined function in the database, or to a user-defined function in the conceptual model.
Methods that have this attribute can be called from LINQ to Entities queries.
To use an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EdmFunctionAttribute> to map a CLR method to a function, the following must be true:
The return type of the CLR method must be compatible with the return type of the mapped-to function.
The argument types of the CLR method must be compatible with the argument types of the mapped-to function.
For information about compatible types, see [Conceptual Model Types (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/987b995f-e429-4569-9559-b4146744def4).
The namespace of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.
The name of the mapped-to function.
The namespace of the mapped-to function.
The namespace of the mapped-to function.
